post.author: 김성욱
post.content:
Title: J2EE Team Lead Skills: Team Lead, J2EE, UML, JMS
Date: 9-10-2003 Location: Toronto, CDA Canada Area code: 416
Tax term: CON_W2 Pay rate: Negotiable/Hour Length: Temp
Position ID: 300110 Dice ID: teksyst
Job description: Our client, a leader in the financial industry, is currently looking for two Team Leads to join their current development project.
The incumbent will: - Understand and translate business requirements into Design and Specification - Lead and mentor small development teams to develop applications. - Assist and code complex functionalities - Document the developed applications and code such that the code is maintainable. - Support applications during their initial deployment phase with application enhancements and bug fixes.
Requirement: J2SE (Java 2 Standard Edition) Senior - JDBC J2EE (Java 2 Enterprise Edition) Senior - Session beans / Entity beans / Message beans - Security - JMS - XML (SAX, DOM, XSL) - JSP, Servlets Experience with databases(ORACLE) and knowledge of SQL. Tools / miscellaneous / concepts - CVS - Unix - Design Patterns - Ant - UML - XML - Jakarta Struts - Experience in the financial services industry * 1-2 years of previous experience as a team-lead for a J2EE project. Strong people skills is a must. * Strong analytical, problem solving and presentation skills. * Well-developed written communication skills with proficiency in grammar, spelling and simple language use. * High standards of accuracy and detail. * Flexible, adaptable and able to work effectively in a constantly changing project team environment. %0
Join TEKsystems, one of the leading IT consulting and services providers in Canada and the United States. As a result of our rapid growth and merger with our sister company, Maxim Group, we are constantly searching for talented technical professionals with all levels of information technology and communications skills. From the personal delivery of your weekly cheques, to our dedication at finding you the next project, we take care of our people. TEKsystems knows that every professional has different needs, so we'll work together to determine a suitable benefits package. We offer our team members medical, dental, provisions for vacation and holiday pay, EAP (Employee Assistance Plan), Lawline (24 hour Legal Assistance), FoneMed (24 hour Health Advice), and technical and professional training.
Travel required: none Telecommute: no
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Contact for more information: Hellard,Gary TEKsystems 5975 Whittle Road Suite 200
Mississauga, ON 431
Phone: (905) 501-2857 Fax: (407) 736-8590
E-mail: ghellard@teksystems.com Web: http://www.teksystems.com/
post.title: J2EE Team Lead - Toronto
